subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Adam Helfant, a former lawyer for the N.H.L. and a Nike executive, was hired to run the men’s professional tennis tour. Helfant takes over the ATP a week before the start of the Australian Open. Helfant, 44, replaces Étienne de Villiers, who ran the tour since 2005 and stepped down last year.
